299474.「だっ 団長！ オレ……先日\n 迷惑をかけてしまった お詫びをしたいんです。\:
I'm sorry for the trouble I caused you the other day. I...want to apologize for the trouble I caused you the other day. Would you
mind receiving this...?

299475.「これは……王都の桜もち！\n よく 僕の大好物が わかりましたね？:
This... is Royal Cherry Mochi! How did
you know what I like?

299476.「先日も言いましたが\n ミスや間違いは 誰にでもあるものですから\n いつまで:
As I said the other day, everyone makes
mistakes, and there is no need to dwell on
them.

299477.「けれど セツラン君の気持ちと\n 僕の大好物は しかと 受け取りました。:
However, I received Setsuran's feelings and my
favorite food.

299478.「……そうだ！ せっかくですし 守護騎士団の\n みんなで食べませんか？ 家に帰:
Yes! Since we're here, why don't we eat
together with all the Guardians? I don't like
the idea of going home and eating alone.

299480.「ふい～ ゴチになりました！\n にしても 団チョって 桜もちが好きなんだ～？\:
Thanks for the drink! But Dancho likes cherry
cake? You have a cute side, don't you?<heart>

299481.「はは……昔は 違ったんですけどね。\n 桜もちは 僕の奥さんの 大好物で……\:
Well...it used to be different. Sakura-mochi
is my wife's favorite food.

299483.「えええええっ！？\n だ だ だ 団長の奥様！？\n 団長に……奥様がっ！？:
Eh, eh, eh! The Commander's wife! The
Commander has... a wife!

299484.「し……知りませんでした。\n だって 団長は 天涯孤独の身だって……。:
I didn't know... I didn't know that the
Commander is all alone in life...

299485.「それは 事実ですよ。僕に 家族はいません。\n 妻がいたのは……昔の話です。:
It's true. I have no family. I had a wife... a
long time ago.

299486.「当時の僕は 多少 名の知れた戦士でしてね。\n 仕事には 困らないものの\n:
At the time, I was a somewhat well-known
warrior. I had a good job, but my days were
bleak.

299487.「ある日のこと 偶然\n 魔物に襲われている女性を見つけ 助け出し……\n やが:
One day, we happened to find a woman being
attacked by a monster and rescued her... and
eventually we fell in love.

299488.「彼女は 太陽のような女性で 身寄りのない僕に\n 『一緒に 家族を作ろう』と言:
She was like the sun, and she told me, "Let's start a family together," as I had no relatives. I married her and we had a
daughter.

299489.「娘は 小さくて やわらかくて……この世界に\n こんなに愛しいものが存在すると:
My daughter is small and soft... and I didn't
know that something so lovely could exist in
this world.

299490.「……この子のためなら\n なんだって できると思った。: I thought I could do anything for her.

299491.「娘が生まれてからの 数年は\n あっと言う間に 過ぎてゆき……ある日\n 僕は:
The years since the birth of my daughter have
flown by... and one day I invited my family
for a picnic.

299492.「そこは 景色こそ良いものの\n 魔物が生息する場所で 妻は嫌がりました。\n:
The view was nice, but the place was inhabited
by monsters, and my wife didn't like it. But
at the time, I was...

299493.<center><pipipi_low>ははは……俺は 一流の戦士だぜ？\n魔物:
<pipipi_low>Haha...I'm a first class warrior.
Monsters are nothing to worry about.

299494.「己のチカラに 絶大な自信があった僕は\n 妻と娘を連れて 出かけたのです。\n:
I was so confident in my own abilities that I
took my wife and daughter along with me.
But...

299495.「繁殖期か 何かだったのか……\n 普段は 数えるほどしかいないはずの魔物が\n:
It must have been breeding season or something... monsters, which normally only exist in small numbers, appeared in large
numbers and attacked us.

299496.「僕は 妻と娘を守りながら 戦いましたが\n 魔物は次々と現れ キリがなく……\:
I fought on, protecting my wife and daughter, but the monsters kept coming, one after another, with no end in sight...and that's
when I finally ran out of energy.

299498.「妻は……妻は おとりとなったのです。\n 『逃げて』と叫ぶと 魔物を引きつけな:
My wife... my wife became a decoy. I shouted,
'Run,' and she moved away, attracting the
monster...

299499.「僕は 娘を抱きかかえて 走りました。\n 彼女の安全を確保して すぐに戻りまし:
I took my daughter in my arms and ran. I got
her to safety and quickly returned, but my
wife was... well... gone.

299500.「妻の両親は激怒し 僕と縁を切ると言いました。\n お前には 任せられないと\n:
My wife's parents were furious and said they
would disown me. They took our daughter with
them, saying, "We can't leave you in charge.

299501.「僕は……何も言えませんでした。\n むしろ そうすべきだと思った。\n 人の親:
I...couldn't say anything. In fact, I thought
I should have. I thought I wasn't qualified to
be a parent...

299502.「じゃあ……娘さんとは それきり……？: So... you and your daughter never spoke again?

299503.「ええ。義父は 僕が 妻と一緒に\n 死んだことにすると言っていましたから 娘は:
Yes. My stepfather said he would pretend I
died with my wife, so she wouldn't even know I
was alive.

299504.「あれから ２０年……きっと あの子も\n 素敵な女性に なっていることでしょう:
Twenty years have passed since then, and I am
sure she has become a wonderful woman.

299505.「妻の死後 僕は 人を守るための職業である\n パラディンに転職し……やがて\n:
After my wife's death, I changed careers to become a paladin, a vocation to protect others... and was eventually recruited to
become a guardian, which is where I am today.

299506.「……僕の 若き日の過ちといったところです。\n 君たちは どうか 僕のようにな:
It was a mistake of my youth. I hope you will
not be like me and protect those you want to
protect.

299507.「おっと！ もう こんな時間ですか。\n おじさんの長話なんか 退屈だったでしょ:
Oops! Is it that late already? I bet you were
bored with my uncle's long talk, weren't you?
Let's get back to work, shall we?

299508.「じゃあ……オレも 門の見張りに戻ります。\n <pc>も あとで\n 希望なき:
Well...I'm going back to guard the gate. Can
<pc> come to Hopeless Wasteland later
too...?
